title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.36 - Ordering from regular security officer lists
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.36 - Ordering from regular security officer lists

State Regulations

Qualified employees from regular security officer lists
shall be selected in accordance with their seniority classification with the
employer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5.36

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
